title: Gray River
blocka: Action: Convert any number of Timber dice into Fortune dice.

title: Mirror Woods, Magical
blockb: Immediate: Spend 9 progress to raise Timber track by one.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test: Survival 3. Failure: All characters are Weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blockb: Action: Spend progress. 4: +1 Timber die. 7: +2 Timber dice. 9: +3 Timber dice. 10: +4 Timber dice.
blockc: (CALAMITY) A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: (SORCERY) Test: Lore 2. Failure: One character is shaken.

title: Searching the Banks
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: Scouting Ahead
blockc: Immediate: Spend 4 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Clearing the Dark Woods
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Complete mission path. Burn card.

title: The Necromancer
blockb: Action: Test Lore 3. Success: Gain +2 Mana dice and burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (WEIRD) +4 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Hall of Traps
blockc: Immediate: Spend 2 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: The Runeward
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: The Necromancer's Dark Heart
blockc: Immediate: Spend 6 progress. Complete mission path. Burn card.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Ore Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Ore. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Mana Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Engines of Progress
blocka: Interrupt: Place progress in any Red Bank wilderness location or attachment equal to Conquest.

title: Rocky Terrain
blocka: Immediate: Test Survival 1. Success: +1 Fortune. Failure: +2 Discord.

title: Storms
blocka: Immediate: Test Survival 1. Success: +1 Fortune. Failure: +2 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Grueling Wilds
blocka: Placement: On character with lowest Survival.

title: Exploration Force
blocka: Immediate: Gain Fortune equal to Conquest.
